price: ߒ ߠߊ߫ ߘߊ߲ߞߊ ߟߵߌ ߡߊ߬ ߡߎ߬ߕߎ߲߬ ߞߊ߬ ߕߊ߯ ߊ߬ ߛߌ߰ ߛߙߊ߬ߟߌ ߟߏ߲ ߠߊ߫
arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيۡكَ لَعۡنَتِيٓ إِلَىٰ يَوۡمِ ٱلدِّينِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wa-inna ʿalayka laʿnatī ilā yawmi al-dīni
